author: mmusich
body:
#### PR description:

It is sometimes useful (required) to produce plots of the fraction of luminosity a given pixel component is bad, in order to either use the information for the dynamic bad FED channel simulation or just for display purposes (e.g. to take decisions about what components to mask).  
I port in `cmssw` a private code that has been used for this purpose in the past years.

#### PR validation:

This PR introduces a unit test for the introduced class. 
I tested it successfully with `scram b runtests_SiPixelCondPlottingTests` and obtained [these pictures](http://musich.web.cern.ch/musich/display/SiPixelCondPlottingTests/). 
Here's an example:

![image](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/assets/5082376/561454e5-2730-4988-88dd-fe279c167c1b)

Not a backport.
title: Introduce `SiPixelQualityPlotter`
